product_name: Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight Long Underwear Crew Top - Women's
long_description: Stay comfortable during any activity in very cold weather with the women's Patagonia Capilene(R) 3 Midweight Long Underwear crew top, a warm and highly breathable next-to-skin layer. The smooth exterior of Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) polyester slides easily under layers, and its brushed interior feels soft against skin, wicks moisture and dries quickly. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Fabric treatment helps deter odors. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams and increase range of motion and comfort. Thumbholes warm wrists and protect hands. Hem is long enough in back to stay tucked in. The women's Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight Long Underwear crew top features a contoured, slim fit that won't restrict your movement.
